name: Cape of the Mountebank
description: While wearing this cape, you can use it to cast the Dimension Door spell as a Magic action. This property can't be used again until the next dawn. When you disappear, you leave behind a cloud of smoke, and you appear in a similar cloud of smoke at your destination. The smoke lightly obscures the spaces you left and the space you appear in, and it dissipates at the end of your next turn. A light or stronger wind disperses the smoke.
